snippet: Call me a bad person if you want. I can’t help it. I’m a father.
abstract: Op-Ed article by author M O Walsh describes his own growing paranoia about ants after discovering his son had life-threatening allergy to fire ant bites; notes despite success of desensitization process for his son, his own fear of ants persists, in many ways proxy for array of worries he has as a father.
lead_paragraph: Call me a bad person if you want. I can’t help it. I’m a father.
